# Introduction
This **R** package provides an in-silico method for finemapping of genetic regions in mice.


# Installation
```{r setup, eval=FALSE}
if(!requireNamespace("BiocManager", quietly = TRUE))
    install.packages("BiocManager")
BiocManager::install("mmus")
```

or 

```{r eval=FALSE}
devtools::install_github('matmu/mmus', build_vignettes = TRUE)
```

# Loading package
```{r}
library(mmus)
```

# Example function calls
```{r}
# Call mmusfinemap to finemap a specific region
res = mmusfinemap("chr1", start=5000000, end=6000000, strain1=c("C57BL_6J"), strain2=c("AKR_J", "A_J", "BALB_cJ"))
res[1:10,]
```
